b'3-gatsu no Lion meets Bump of Chicken': b'A CGI music video of Sangatsu no Lion set to Bump of Chicken\'s "Fighter" single. The website states that the collaboration started because the mangaka Umino Chika is a fan of Bump of Chicken and the members of Bump of Chicken are fans of Sangatsu no Lion. A special edition of the manga\'s 10th compiled volume shipped on November 28 with this single.\n\n(Source: ANN)'
